drug.name: MC-1
drug.description: Medicure's MC-1 drug is a cardio-protectant, designed to reduce the damage to the heart when arteries are blocked and when they are subsequently reopened after bypass surgery.
drug.indication: Investigated for use/treatment in coronary artery disease.
drug.mechanism-of-action: MC-1 is a biologically active natural product which can be regarded as a chemical entity that has been evolutionarily selected and validated for binding to particular protein domains. Thus, its underlying structural architecture, or scaffold, has already been biologically established as safe and active, providing a powerful guiding principle for novel drug and library development.
